verses.verse: In the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> of <S%H4074>Median<s%> <S%H2233>descent,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> –

in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%> I, <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H995>observed<s%> in the <S%H5612>books<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was [revealed as] the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> for the <S%H4390>completion<s%> of the <S%H2723>desolations<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> [namely,] <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

So I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H6440>attention<s%> to the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> [Him by] <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and <S%H8469>supplications,<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H665>ashes.<s%>

And I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H3034>confessed<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H577>"Alas,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> for those who <S%H157>love<s%> Him and <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

we have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H5753>committed<s%> <S%H5753>iniquity,<s%> <S%H7561>acted<s%> <S%H7561>wickedly,<s%> and <S%H4775>rebelled,<s%> even <S%H5493>turning<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from Thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>

"Moreover, we have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> to our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> our fathers, and <S%H1>all<s%> the <S%H3605>people<s%> of the <S%H5971>land.<s%>

<S%H6666>"Righteousness<s%> belongs to Thee, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> but to us <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H1322>shame,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> – to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> those who are <S%H7138>nearby<s%> and those who are <S%H7350>far<s%> away in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>countries<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H5080>driven<s%> them, because of their <S%H4604>unfaithful<s%> <S%H4604>deeds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H4603>committed<s%> against Thee.

<S%H6440>"Open<s%> <S%H1322>shame<s%> belongs to us, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and our fathers, <S%H1>because<s%> we have <S%H834>sinned<s%> against Thee.
"To the <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> belong <S%H7356>compassion<s%> and <S%H5547>forgiveness,<s%> for we have <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against Him;

<S%H3808>nor<s%> have we <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in His <S%H8451>teachings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us <S%H3027>through<s%> His <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

"Indeed <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> Thy <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside,<s%> not <S%H8085>obeying<s%> Thy <S%H6963>voice;<s%> so the <S%H423>curse<s%> has been <S%H5413>poured<s%> out on us, along with the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> for we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Him.

"Thus He has <S%H6965>confirmed<s%> His <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us and <S%H5921>against<s%> our <S%H8199>rulers<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H8199>ruled<s%> us, to <S%H935>bring<s%> on us <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H9567>calamity;<s%> for <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> there has not been <S%H6213>done<s%> [anything] like <S%H9201>what<s%> was <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

"As it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9567>calamity<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> on us; yet we have not <S%H9134>sought<s%> the <S%H9134>favor<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> by <S%H7725>turning<s%> from our <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and <S%H7919>giving<s%> <S%H7919>attention<s%> to Thy <S%H571>truth.<s%>

"Therefore, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8245>kept<s%> the <S%H9567>calamity<s%> in <S%H8245>store<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it on us; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> with <S%H5921>respect<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4639>deeds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He has <S%H6213>done,<s%> but we have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> His <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> hast <S%H3318>brought<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and hast <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H8034>name<s%> for Thyself, as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> – we have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> we have <S%H7561>been<s%> <S%H7561>wicked.<s%>

"O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> in accordance with <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H6666>acts,<s%> let <S%H4994>now<s%> Thine <S%H639>anger<s%> and Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from Thy <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> for <S%H3588>because<s%> of our <S%H2399>sins<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of our fathers, <S%H1>Jerusalem<s%> and Thy <S%H3389>people<s%> [have become] a <S%H5971>reproach<s%> to <S%H2781>all<s%> those <S%H3605>around<s%> us.

"So <S%H6258>now,<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> and to his <S%H8469>supplications,<s%> and for Thy <S%H4616>sake,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> let Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H215>shine<s%> on Thy <S%H8076>desolate<s%> <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

"O my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5186>incline<s%> Thine <S%H241>ear<s%> and <S%H8085>hear!<s%> <S%H6491>Open<s%> Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> our <S%H8074>desolations<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> by Thy <S%H8034>name;<s%> for we are not <S%H5307>presenting<s%> our <S%H8469>supplications<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee on <S%H5921>account<s%> of any <S%H6666>merits<s%> of our own, but on <S%H5921>account<s%> of Thy <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H7356>compassion.<s%>

"O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H8085>hear!<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H5545>forgive!<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H7181>listen<s%> and <S%H6213>take<s%> <S%H6213>action!<s%> For Thine own <S%H4616>sake,<s%> O my <S%H430>God,<s%> do not <S%H309>delay,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> Thy <S%H5892>city<s%> and Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7121>called<s%> by Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>"

Now <S%H5750>while<s%> I was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> and <S%H6419>praying,<s%> and <S%H3034>confessing<s%> my <S%H9128>sin<s%> and the <S%H9128>sin<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5307>presenting<s%> my <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H5921>behalf<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of my <S%H430>God,<s%>

<S%H5750>while<s%> I was <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> in <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> then the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1403>Gabriel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H8462>previously,<s%> <S%H5060>came<s%> to me in [my] <S%H3286>extreme<s%> <S%H3288>weariness<s%> about the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

And he <S%H995>gave<s%> [me] <S%H995>instruction<s%> and <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me, and <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> I have <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7919>give<s%> you <S%H7919>insight<s%> with <S%H998>understanding.<s%>

"At the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of your <S%H8469>supplications<s%> the <S%H1697>command<s%> was <S%H3318>issued,<s%> and I have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> [you,] for you are <S%H9143>highly<s%> <S%H9143>esteemed;<s%> so <S%H995>give<s%> <S%H995>heed<s%> to the <S%H1697>message<s%> and <S%H995>gain<s%> <S%H995>understanding<s%> of the <S%H4758>vision.<s%>

<S%H7657>"Seventy<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> have been <S%H2852>decreed<s%> for your <S%H5971>people<s%> and your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> to <S%H3615>finish<s%> the <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> to <S%H8552>make<s%> an <S%H8552>end<s%> of <S%H9128>sin,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> in <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> to <S%H2856>seal<s%> up <S%H2377>vision<s%> and <S%H5030>prophecy,<s%> and to <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> [place.]

"So you are to <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H7919>discern<s%> [that] from the <S%H4161>issuing<s%> of a <S%H1697>decree<s%> to <S%H7725>restore<s%> and <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H4899>Messiah<s%> the <S%H5057>Prince<s%> [there will be] <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> and sixty-two <S%H7620>weeks;<s%> it will be <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> with <S%H7339>plaza<s%> and <S%H9169>moat,<s%> even in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6695>distress.<s%>

"Then <S%H310>after<s%> the sixty-two <S%H7620>weeks<s%> the <S%H4899>Messiah<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> and <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>nothing,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H5057>prince<s%> who is to <S%H935>come<s%> will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%> And its <S%H7093>end<s%> [will come] with a <S%H7858>flood;<s%> even to the <S%H7093>end<s%> there will be <S%H4421>war;<s%> <S%H8074>desolations<s%> are <S%H2782>determined.<s%>

"And he will <S%H1396>make<s%> a <S%H1396>firm<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H7227>many<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7620>week,<s%> but in the <S%H2677>middle<s%> of the <S%H7620>week<s%> he will <S%H7673>put<s%> a <S%H7673>stop<s%> to <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> and grain <S%H4503>offering;<s%> and on the <S%H3671>wing<s%> of <S%H8251>abominations<s%> [will come] one who <S%H8074>makes<s%> <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> a <S%H3617>complete<s%> <S%H3617>destruction,<s%> one that is <S%H2782>decreed,<s%> is <S%H5413>poured<s%> out on the one who <S%H8074>makes<s%> <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>"
